Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the MTA to file a copy of proposed station closings with various governmental agencies
Summary: Requires the MTA to file a copy of proposed station closings with various governmental agencies; provides that the MTA hold a public hearing on any proposed closings; allows the MTA to not comply with the filing provisions for emergency repairs or repairs that cause the station to close for less than twenty-four hours.
LawCode: Amd ยง1277, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the MTA to post a schedule of station closings
